product_desc:
My website is not public yet, that is why the url looks a bit odd. It's a prototype.

LawPlex allows people to initiate a small claims lawsuit in minutes. 

It's simple, when someone or a company wrongs you, many times the only way to be taken serious by is by presenting a formal lawsuit.

At LawPlex, we take care of the tedious and prolonged process of small claim lawsuits for our clients. We assist in filing our clients lawsuit on their behalf. LawPlex will update our clients on their case and notify them of any important information regarding their case. 

LawPlex will deal with all of the paperwork for our clients, making this process easy for them. We will also take care of the "summons service" process on behalf of our clients for free. 

As long as everything is filed in a timely matter and our clients win their case, more times than not, our clients can have the amount of money they spent on LawPlex added to their judgement. Essentially making our service free for them.
name: LawPlex
